title: "Tech start-up RoEx unveils AI-powered music mixing tool Automix"
excerpt: "Tech start-up RoEx has launched Automix, a tool that brings AI-powered mixing to music production. RoEx has its roots in academia, born out of a PhD project at the intersection of music and machine learning, with Queen Mary University of London. The start-up aims to democratise music creation."
